txt.en: As you look at the spider remains, you hear sounds in the tunnel. Not the sounds of spiders, but the sounds of drakes and other dragon-kind. They are drawing near. Prepare to defend yourself!
You should return to Agátur, back in Skarháld.

Beyond the corpse of a spider lies a large crack in the old dwarf crafting halls of Stormwall. Singed webbing coats the abyss. You wonder what could lie within these ancient spider tunnels. Perhaps the spider in front of you has more clues.

Beyond the corpse of a spider lies a large crack in the old dwarf crafting halls of Stormwall. Singed webbing coats the abyss. You wonder what could lie within these ancient spider tunnels. Perhaps the spider in front of you has more clues.
Deep within Stormwall lies a fiery secret, slumbering in the shadows.
A spider corpse can be found deep within Stormwall, high in the mountains north-east of Skarháld.\n\nYou should examine the spider corpse.

'[placeholder]. You have returned, alive. Of that I am most glad! This dwarf you rescued, Drengur, claims that he saw not a drake or worm, but a dragon.\n\n'I will speak with Hórin. If Etterfang yet lives, she is a mortal enemy to both the Longbeards and the Zhélruka! We must act before the beast awakes!'
